pageProduct.name: Scholl Ball of Foot Cushion Shoe Insole 1 un
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Scholl Ball Of Foot Cushions protection, gives immediate relief from burning pain on the ball of foot and helps prevent build up of hard skin.

Scholl Ball of Foot Cushions.


How are Scholl Ball of Foot Cushions different? 


Scholl Ball of Foot cushions provide immediate relief from burning pain or tender areas on the ball of the foot. Made of dual layer foam which provides cushioning and pressure relief.

Boxed Contents: 1 Pair

Size: 1 Pair

Warnings

Keep out of the reach of children.

PRECAUTIONS

Cover any broken skin prior use, Do not use on irritated skin.

Directions

Place loop over the second toe. Roll hosiery onto the foot and then position the pad so that it is comfortably placed under the tender area. Washing instructions: Hand wash with mild soap and lukewarm water. Rinse thoroughly then leave to dry naturally.

USAGE ADVICE

Please seek advice before use if you have diabetes as your foot condition may require treatment by a healthcare professional.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store in a cool, dry place out of direct sunlight. If seal on pack is broken, do not use.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes

Recycling Code: 5 PP

Washable?: true
